```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r out.width = '80%', echo = FALSE, fig.align = 'center'}
knitr::include_graphics('gsw-shot-charts.png')
```


```{r}
last <- read.csv("../data1/shots-data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
last
aggregate(last$shot_made_flag, by = list(last$name), FUN = sum)
```

```{r}
select(summarize(arrange(last, desc(minutes_remaining), group_by = name), name, total = shot_made_flag, )
arrange(summarize(group_by(last, name)))
```

```{r}
arrange(summarize(group_by(last, name)), total = row(filter(two_point, name == two_point$name)))))
```
